data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rightmyer, Molly G., Deyrup, Mark, Ascher, John S., Griswold, Terry (2011): Osmia species (Hymenoptera, Megachilidae) from the southeastern United States with modified facial hairs: taxonomy, host plants, and conservation status. ZooKeys 148: 257-278, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.148.1497, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.148.1497
